demo_account.instructions: This demo account has full access to all assessment types. Test the mobile-first workflow: 1) Create account in mobile app, 2) Purchase assessment, 3) Login to website www.ieltsaiprep.com with same credentials for desktop access.

app_review_information.notes: This app implements a mobile-first authentication workflow where users must register and purchase through the mobile app first, then can optionally login to the website www.ieltsaiprep.com using the same credentials for desktop/laptop access. All in-app purchases are handled through Apple's billing system at $36.49 USD per assessment type.
